code: import{combineReducers}from'redux';import userReducer from'./user/userReducer';var articlesReducer=function articlesReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:[];var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case'FETCH_ARTICLES':return action.payload;case'UPDATE_ARTICLE':return state.map(function(article){return article.id===action.payload.id?action.payload:article;});default:return state;}};var categoriesReducer=function categoriesReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:[];var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case'FETCH_CATEGORIES':return action.payload;default:return state;}};var textSearchReducer=function textSearchReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:'';var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case'SET_SEARCH_TEXT':return action.payload;default:return state;}};var totalReducer=function totalReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:'';var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case'FETCH_TOTAL':return action.payload;default:return state;}};var rootReducer=combineReducers({articles:articlesReducer,categories:categoriesReducer,textSearch:textSearchReducer,total:totalReducer,user:userReducer});export default rootReducer;
